name: Super Mario Sunshine Arcade 2
overview: Super Mario Arcade 2 is a mod for Super Mario Sunshine that contains 96 unique levels that are similar to the secret levels in sunshine. 48 of those levels are from the original. Also in each level, there is a blue coin as an extra challenge. Don't worry about collecting them all, since they aren't worth anything. You can always collect them at the end. Special Thanks: Noki Doki - Helping(more like doing for me) a TON with the ASM stuff. Shibboleet - For making a tool called corona and also helping with ASM arookas - Helping me understand the collision format. miluaces - Making the SMS bin editor, which is the backbone of this hack. Yoshi2/Gamma - For making SuperBMD, which is used to import custom models google_cheese - Testing on console Cyber- Making the banner All the other members of the sunshine modding community for teachning me how to do this stuff.
